CustomField.description: Determines whether today is within the Subscription’s Start and End Dates. Can be used for Subscription-level reports as desired. Flows into the corresponding CAT record via APEX code to enable reporting on Active subscriptions.
CustomField.formula: OR( SBQQ__StartDate__c <= today() && SBQQ__EndDate__c >= today(), ISNULL(SBQQ__EndDate__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines whether today is within the Subscription’s Start and End Dates. Can be used for Subscription-level reports as desired. Flows into the corresponding CAT record via APEX code to enable reporting on Active subscriptions.
CustomField.label: Currently In Date Range
